attributes.action: UKIP to be allowed participation in the 2015 Televised debates
attributes.additional_details: It is totally unfair that UKIP Nationally has more support than the Lib Dems, however since they're unlikely to gain a majority in most constituency, they're just overlooked as not being one of the 3 main parties. UKIP must be given the chance to express their views on the televised debated!
